body: man i think dio deserves it he always bully the fat nerd dude
Though it might also be her secret that she needs to protect from comming to light a bit unsure of it, but anyhow the secret is from what I translated never explained

Tried to translate some to understand whats going on and well, the girl and the blond dude loves each other, but after the blonde dude confessed to her and they were about to become a couple the glasses dude turned up and started to blackmail the girl because of a secret he knew. I never really understood what the secret is but in the end it's pretty much stated that as long as he has this secret he can keep forcing her to do what he wants and she's pretty much his sex slave to stop the blonde dudes secret from comming to light. However I also think that in the end the girl is starting to "enjoy" working hard to keep that secret from comming to light.
